main event: Reported sighting of a silvery, disc-shaped object approximately 40-50 feet long that was able to hover, go up and down, and move side to side.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10-15 minutes.
Physical specimens or debris were forwarded in a shrouded coffin, which were picked up in Athens County, Ohio.

A telephone conversation was held between the Athens County Sheriff's Office and a Technical Sergeant Richard R. Glidden at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base regarding the object that was found in the county.
The case contains 'chaff', which is a type of radar countermeasure.
Several field deputies from the Athens County Sheriff's Office were involved in the investigation.
sighted object: silvery, disc-shaped object approximately 40-50 feet long
witnesses: Unknown, potentially the farmer who found the physical specimens or debris
photographs: No photographs included in the report
